author: Staff Reporter
text: Ramakrishna Mission Vidyalaya, Periyanaickenpalayam, celebrated Sri Ramakrishna Paramahamsa Gurupuja on Sunday. A release says that Mission centres have been celebrating Gurupuja on the first Sunday of every year for the past 80 years. On January 3, Vidyalaya students along with residents in the neighbourhood conducted nama samkeertanam and hoisted flag.
title: Gurupuja celebrated
